name: ServiceFabricUpdater
description: Update specified values in the Service Fabric manifest files.
author: Colin Farrelly

inputs.name: AppManifestPath
inputs.label: Application Manifest path
inputs.helpMarkdown: Path to the application manifest file.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Application version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version to either overwrite the current version with or append to it.

inputs.name: VersionType
inputs.label: Application version type
inputs.helpMarkDown: This decides wheather to overwrite the current version with the version specified above or append the version above as a revision to the current version.

inputs.name: Port
inputs.label: Port number
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will update the port number the service is deployed to. If there are multiple services the port will be incremented.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment code
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will add the environment qualifier to the name of the application.

inputs.name: Tenant
inputs.label: Tenant code
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will add the tenant code to the name of the application.

inputs.name: Region
inputs.label: Region name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This will set the region environment variable up.

messages.PS_InvalidErrorActionPreference: Invalid ErrorActionPreference '{0}'. The value must be one of: 'Stop', 'Continue', or 'SilentlyContinue'
messages.PS_InvalidFilePath: Invalid file path '{0}'. A valid path to the manifest file is required.
messages.PS_MissingPortAttribute: The port attribute does not exist on the '{0}' endpoint in the '{1}' service manifest file.
messages.PS_UnableToDetermineExitCode: Unexpected exception. Unable to determine the exit code from powershell.
messages.PS_NoPort: No port provided, using default port in service manifests...
messages.PS_UpdatingManifest: Updating the service manifest located at '{0}'
